bill.summary:
Blue Ridge National Heritage Area Reauthorization Act of 2019
This bill extends through FY2021 the authority of the Department of the Interior to furnish assistance for the Blue Ridge National Heritage Area in North Carolina.
The bill also increases the amount authorized to be appropriated for the heritage area.
